ColourWords.Title: Possessive ’s
ColourWords.Instruction: Click on the words with possessive ’s. There are five possessive ’s in the text.

Content.Sentence: My name’s Len, I’m from Wellington in New Zealand and I’ve got a fantastic family: my mother’s name’s Carla, my father is Ken and I’ve got a brother, Phil and a sister, Wendy. Wendy’s husband’s name is Nick. He’s Italian and he’s got a pizza restaurant in Wellington. Wendy’s got two children, a son and a daughter. Danny’s six years old and his sister, Nina’s four. I’m Danny’s favourite uncle! Phil’s wife is Natalie and they’ve got four boys.
